Kural_Info.Chapter: இனியவை கூறல் (The Utterance of Pleasant Words)
Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: பணிவுடையன் இன்சொலன் ஆதல் ஒருவற்குஅணியல்ல மற்றுப் பிற.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Humility and sweetness of speech are the ornaments of man; all others are not (ornaments).

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person stands with a humble posture ('பணிவுடையன்') and is speaking a pleasant word ('இன்சொலன்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: Instead of wearing physical jewelry, their humility manifests as a beautiful, glowing circlet of soft white light around their head, and their pleasant words form a necklace of sparkling, golden light around their neck. These are their true ornaments ('அணி').
Layered_Composition.Background: In the background, piles of discarded physical jewelry—gold chains, crowns, gem-studded rings ('மற்றுப் பிற')—lie on the ground, looking dull, lifeless, and unimportant in comparison.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Humility and pleasant speech are declared to be the only true ornaments for a person; all material jewelry is worthless in comparison.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The virtues are literalized as ornaments of light, which are far more beautiful and radiant than the physical jewelry. The discarded pile of gold and gems emphasizes their secondary, non-essential nature.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Authentic beauty, virtuous adornment, inner worth over outer show.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The person is illuminated by the soft, beautiful light of their own virtuous ornaments. The physical jewelry in the background is dimly lit and lacks any sparkle or radiance.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A dignified portrait shot, focusing on the person and their ornaments of light.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with ethereal light effects for the virtuous adornments.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: The subject is self-illuminated by their virtues, creating a divine and noble effect.

Cultural_Anchors: The worthlessness of other (material) things (மற்றுப் பிற)

Flux_Optimized_Prompt.Negative_Prompt: arrogant person, ugly light ornaments, prominent physical jewelry, text artifacts, dark scene.
